resources.string: AV Pipeline Kit is a system of open capabilities for easier media app development. It contains a lightweight framework and a range of high-performance plugins for audio and video processing. The framework parses plugin orchestration logic from each configuration file to create a pipeline with capabilities such as media playback, recording, or editing, while each plugin in a pipeline undertakes specific tasks, for example, demuxing, decoding, and filtering.\n\nAV Pipeline Kit presets pipelines for scenarios like video playback, video super-resolution, and sound event detection, and provides Java APIs for you to use these pipelines. You can also call a single preset plugin directly through C++ APIs. If you want to achieve more functions other than those provided by the preset plugins or pipelines, you can even customize some plugins or pipelines based on your own needs.
Choose Video File to Get Info
Choose Audio File to Get Info
Sound Detection can detect these voices : Laughter, Baby-cry, Snoring, Sneeze, Children-playing, Meow, Bark, Water, Car-alarm, Doorbell, Knock, Alarm, Steam-whistle, Noise
